ownerID.title: Account Owner
ownerID.description: assigned owner of account. Not available in personal edition.

parentID.title: Parent Account
parentID.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent account must be an existing account in salesforce. You can enter the account name, or select (or optionally, create) the account using the lookup icon.

partnerAccountID.title: Partner Account Id
partnerAccountID.description: Partner accounts are accounts that a channel manager uses to manage partner organizations, partner users, and activities when using a partner community or partner portal.

territoryID.title: Territory Id
territoryID.description: The territory to which the account has been assigned.

accountSite.title: Account Site Details
accountSite.description: Information about the account’s location, such as single location, headquarters, or branch. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
annualRevenue.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account.

accountOrganization.title: Account Details
accountOrganization.description: Account details like number of employees, market segment, industry, and location.

naicsDescription.title: NAICS Description
naicsDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its NAICS code.

sicDescription.title: SIC Description
sicDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its SIC code.

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: Ownership of company, for example, public or private. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

isDeleted.title: Account Record Deleted Indicator
isDeleted.description: Indicator whether the Account record is deleted or not.

logoUrl.title: Logo URL
logoUrl.description: Path to be combined with the URL of a Salesforce instance (for example, https://yourInstance.salesforce.com/) to generate a URL to request the social network profile image associated with the account. Generated URL returns an HTTP redirect (code 302) to the social network profile image for the account.

tradeStyle.title: Account Trade Style
tradeStyle.description: A name, different from its legal name, that an organization may use for conducting business. Similar to (Doing business as) or (DBA).

tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
tickerSymbol.description: The stock market symbol for this account. Maximum of 20 characters.
